description: Comprehensive campaign management platform for political campaigns, advocacy groups, and non-profit organizations

core.name: Command Center Dashboard
core.description: Central hub for campaign oversight with real-time metrics and KPIs

core.name: Campaign Control
core.description: Campaign planning, scheduling, and resource management

core.name: Real-Time Monitoring
core.description: Live updates on campaign activities, social media, and field operations

core.name: Intelligence Hub
core.description: Document management and AI-powered analysis for strategic insights

core.name: Alert Center
core.description: Notification system with Information Streams for critical updates

core.name: Volunteer Management
core.description: Volunteer recruitment, scheduling, and coordination tools

core.name: Event Management
core.description: Event planning, registration, and attendance tracking

core.name: Communication Tools
core.description: Email, SMS, and social media outreach capabilities

core.name: Settings & Administration
core.description: User management, permissions, and system configuration

userStories.story: As a campaign manager, I want to view all campaign metrics in one dashboard so I can make informed decisions quickly
As a field organizer, I want to coordinate volunteers efficiently so I can maximize campaign outreach
As a communications director, I want to manage all outreach channels from one platform so I can maintain consistent messaging
As a data analyst, I want to access real-time campaign data so I can provide actionable insights

successCriteria: All core features functional and accessible
Response time under 3 seconds for all operations
Intuitive user interface requiring minimal training
Secure data handling and user authentication
constraints: Must work on modern web browsers
Must be responsive for mobile devices
Must comply with data privacy regulations
